name: displace block
desc: The displace block module translates a field in z by the input surface and input surface data

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Translation Component
properties.desc: The Translation Component is the nodal data component from the Input Surface that allows for non-uniform fault block translation of the Input Field.

properties.name: Displace Scale
properties.desc: The Displace Scale is a factor applied to the interpolated translation component.
